segments.text: I found a great school for Junior !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you think it's a little early to be looking for schools ? We haven't even had the baby yet !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can't be too cautious about these things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are going to be such an adorable father ! Tell me about this school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a huge slide on the playground and lots of trees and even a little brook !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a library right inside the front door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think our child is going to love it !
segments.speaker: S2
